languages.text: Во время перелета дежурная смена Седьмого Погрузочного сектора услышала звуки, напоминающие шипение огромной змеи. Перепуганные рабочие передали сообщение по воксу, а затем заперлись в грузовом контейнере, заварив дверь. Прибывшая на место команда реагирования признаков варп-активности не обнаружила. Рабочих не удалось освободить вовремя, вся смена задохнулась.

traits.locale_text: Во время перелета дежурная смена Седьмого Погрузочного сектора услышала звуки, напоминающие шипение огромной змеи. Перепуганные рабочие передали сообщение по воксу, а затем заперлись в грузовом контейнере, заварив дверь. Прибывшая на место команда реагирования признаков варп-активности не обнаружила. Рабочих не удалось освободить вовремя, вся смена задохнулась.

languages.text: While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew on duty in Loading Bay 7 heard what sounded like the hissing of a giant snake. The terrified workers sent out a vox-message, then locked themselves in a shipping container and welded it shut. The response team sent to the bay found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived, the workers had suffocated.
languages.original_text: Во время перелета дежурная смена Седьмого Погрузочного сектора услышала звуки, напоминающие шипение огромной змеи. Перепуганные рабочие передали сообщение по воксу, а затем заперлись в грузовом контейнере, заварив дверь. Прибывшая на место команда реагирования признаков варп-активности не обнаружила. Рабочих не удалось освободить вовремя, вся смена задохнулась.

traits.locale_text: While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew of the Seventh Loading Bay heard a hissing noise of a giant snake. Scared for their lives, the voidfarers sent a vox message, then locked themselves in the cargo compartment and welded the door shut. The rescue team found no signs of Warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived the whole Seventh Loading bay crew suffocated to death.

While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew of the Seventh Loading Bay heard a hissing noise of a giant snake. Scared for their lives, the voidfarers sent a vox message, then locked themselves in the cargo compartment and welded the door shut. The rescue team found no signs of Warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived the whole Seventh Loading bay crew suffocated to death.

Scared for their lives, the voidfarers sent a vox-message, then locked themselves in the cargo compartment and welded the door shut. The rescue team found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived the whole crew had suffocated to death.

Unfortunately, by the time they arrived the whole crew had suffocated to death.

While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew on duty in Loading Bay 7 heard what sounded like the hissing of a giant snake. The terrified workers sent out a vox-message, then locked themselves in a shipping container and welded it shut. The response team sent to the bay found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived, the workers had suffocated.

While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew on duty in Loading Bay 7 heard what sounded like the hissing of a giant snake. The terrified workers sent out a vox-message, then locked themselves in a shipping container and welded it shut. The response team sent to the bay found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived, the workers had suffocated.

languages.text: 在穿过亚空间时，7号装载区域的值班船员听到了古怪的声音，仿佛是巨蛇吐信的嘶嘶声。那些被吓坏了的工人发送了一条音阵信息，随后就把自己锁在了集装箱里，将集装箱焊死了。特勤小组抵达装载区域时，并没有发现任何亚空间活动的迹象。但遗憾的是，那个时候，集装箱里的工人已经窒息而死。
languages.original_text: While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew on duty in Loading Bay 7 heard what sounded like the hissing of a giant snake. The terrified workers sent out a vox-message, then locked themselves in a shipping container and welded it shut. The response team sent to the bay found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived, the workers had suffocated.

traits.locale_text: 在穿过亚空间时，7号装载区域的值班船员听到了古怪的声音，仿佛是巨蛇吐信的嘶嘶声。那些被吓坏了的工人发送了一条音阵信息，随后就把自己锁在了集装箱里，将集装箱焊死了。特勤小组抵达装载区域时，并没有发现任何亚空间活动的迹象。但遗憾的是，那个时候，集装箱里的工人已经窒息而死。

languages.text: Durante un viaje por el hostil Inmaterio, la tripulación de guardia en la bahía de carga 7 escuchó lo que parecía ser el siseo de una serpiente inmensa. Los trabajadores, aterrados, enviaron un mensaje de socorro por voco, se encerraron en un contenedor de carga y lo sellaron. El equipo de respuesta no encontró signos de actividad disforme, pero lamentablemente los trabajadores se habían asfixiado para cuando llegó el rescate.
languages.original_text: While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew on duty in Loading Bay 7 heard what sounded like the hissing of a giant snake. The terrified workers sent out a vox-message, then locked themselves in a shipping container and welded it shut. The response team sent to the bay found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived, the workers had suffocated.

traits.locale_text: Durante un viaje por el hostil Inmaterio, la tripulación de guardia en la bahía de carga 7 escuchó lo que parecía ser el siseo de una serpiente inmensa. Los trabajadores, aterrados, enviaron un mensaje de socorro por voco, se encerraron en un contenedor de carga y lo sellaron. El equipo de respuesta no encontró signos de actividad disforme, pero lamentablemente los trabajadores se habían asfixiado para cuando llegó el rescate.

languages.text: 非物質世界を移動中、ローディングベイ7で勤務していたクルーたちは巨大な蛇の鳴き声のようなものを聞いた。恐怖に怯えたクルーらは、ヴォクスメッセージを送信し、輸送用コンテナに閉じこもり中から溶接で閉じた。ベイ7に派遣された対応チームは、〈歪み〉活動の兆候を発見できなかった。残念なことに、到着したときにはクルーは既に窒息死していた。
languages.original_text: While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew on duty in Loading Bay 7 heard what sounded like the hissing of a giant snake. The terrified workers sent out a vox-message, then locked themselves in a shipping container and welded it shut. The response team sent to the bay found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived, the workers had suffocated.

traits.locale_text: 非物質世界を移動中、ローディングベイ7で勤務していたクルーたちは巨大な蛇の鳴き声のようなものを聞いた。恐怖に怯えたクルーらは、ヴォクスメッセージを送信し、輸送用コンテナに閉じこもり中から溶接で閉じた。ベイ7に派遣された対応チームは、〈歪み〉活動の兆候を発見できなかった。残念なことに、到着したときにはクルーは既に窒息死していた。

languages.text: Auf der Reise durch das Immaterium hörte die diensthabende Crew in Lademodul 7 etwas, was wie das Zischen einer riesigen Schlange klang. Die verängstigten Arbeiter übermittelten eine Vox-Nachricht und sperrten sich dann in einen Frachtcontainer ein und schweißten ihn zu. Das Sicherheitsteam, das in das Modul geschickt wurde, fand keinerlei Anzeichen von Warp-Aktivität. Bei seinem Eintreffen waren die Arbeiter leider alle schon erstickt.
languages.original_text: While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew on duty in Loading Bay 7 heard what sounded like the hissing of a giant snake. The terrified workers sent out a vox-message, then locked themselves in a shipping container and welded it shut. The response team sent to the bay found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived, the workers had suffocated.

traits.locale_text: Auf der Reise durch das Immaterium hörte die diensthabende Crew in Lademodul 7 etwas, was wie das Zischen einer riesigen Schlange klang. Die verängstigten Arbeiter übermittelten eine Vox-Nachricht und sperrten sich dann in einen Frachtcontainer ein und schweißten ihn zu. Das Sicherheitsteam, das in das Modul geschickt wurde, fand keinerlei Anzeichen von Warp-Aktivität. Bei seinem Eintreffen waren die Arbeiter leider alle schon erstickt.

languages.text: Pendant le voyage dans l'Immaterium, l'équipage aux commandes dans la baie de chargement 7 entendit ce qui ressemblait au sifflement d'un gigantesque serpent. Les ouvriers, terrifiés, envoyèrent un message par vox, avant de s'enfermer dans un container et d'en souder l'entrée. L'équipe de secours envoyée dans la baie ne détecta aucune forme d'activité du Warp. Malheureusement, elle arriva trop tard pour les ouvriers qui s'étaient asphyxiés.
languages.original_text: While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew on duty in Loading Bay 7 heard what sounded like the hissing of a giant snake. The terrified workers sent out a vox-message, then locked themselves in a shipping container and welded it shut. The response team sent to the bay found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived, the workers had suffocated.

traits.locale_text: Pendant le voyage dans l'Immaterium, l'équipage aux commandes dans la baie de chargement 7 entendit ce qui ressemblait au sifflement d'un gigantesque serpent. Les ouvriers, terrifiés, envoyèrent un message par vox, avant de s'enfermer dans un container et d'en souder l'entrée. L'équipe de secours envoyée dans la baie ne détecta aucune forme d'activité du Warp. Malheureusement, elle arriva trop tard pour les ouvriers qui s'étaient asphyxiés.

languages.text: Tindiyar'da yolculuk yapıldığı sırada 7. Yükleme Bölmesi'nde görev yapan mürettebat, devasa bir yılanın tıslamasını andıran bir ses duydu. Korkuya kapılan işçiler, bir voks mesajı gönderdi ve sonrasında kendilerini bir nakliye konteynerine kilitleyip kapısını mühürledi. Bölmeye gönderilen müdahale ekibi, hiçbir öteboyut faaliyeti izine rastlamadı. Ne yazık ki ekip geldiğinde işçiler, çoktan havasızlıktan boğulmuştu.
languages.original_text: While travelling through the Immaterium, the crew on duty in Loading Bay 7 heard what sounded like the hissing of a giant snake. The terrified workers sent out a vox-message, then locked themselves in a shipping container and welded it shut. The response team sent to the bay found no signs of warp activity. Unfortunately, by the time they arrived, the workers had suffocated.
